package.name: flame.collections
package.description: The flame.collections package contains the classes for the Flex collection components.
package.shortDescription: The flame.collections package contains the classes for the Flex collection components.

package.name: flame.config
package.description: The flame.config package contains types for handling configuration data.
package.shortDescription: The flame.config package contains types for handling configuration data.

package.name: flame.controls
package.description: The flame.controls package contains the Flex user-interface controls.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls package contains the Flex user-interface controls.

package.name: flame.controls.events
package.description: The flame.controls.events package contains the classes that define Flex event objects for the user-interface controls.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls.events package contains the classes that define Flex event objects for the user-interface controls.

package.name: flame.controls.mx
package.description: The flame.controls.mx package contains the MX component classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls.mx package contains the MX component classes.

package.name: flame.controls.spark
package.description: The flame.controls.spark package contains the Spark component classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls.spark package contains the Spark component classes.

package.name: flame.controls.spark.layouts
package.description: The flame.controls.spark.layouts package contains the Spark layout classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls.spark.layouts package contains the Spark layout classes.

package.name: flame.controls.spark.skins
package.description: The flame.controls.spark.skins package contains the base classes used by Spark skin classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.controls.spark.skins package contains the base classes used by Spark skin classes.

package.name: flame.core
package.description: The flame.core package contains the fundamental classes and base classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.core package contains the fundamental classes and base classes.

package.name: flame.crypto
package.description: The flame.crypto package provides cryptographic services, including secure encoding and decoding of data, as well as many other operations, such as hashing, random number generation, and message authentication.
package.shortDescription: The flame.crypto package provides cryptographic services.

package.name: flame.crypto.asn1
package.description: The flame.crypto.asn1 package contains classes to support Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) encoding and decoding using the Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER).
package.shortDescription: The flame.crypto.asn1 package contains classes to support ASN.1 encoding and decoding.

package.name: flame.formatters
package.description: The flame.formatters package contains classes to support data formatting.
package.shortDescription: The flame.formatters package contains classes to support data formatting.

package.name: flame.numerics
package.description: The flame.numerics package contains numeric types that complement the numeric primitives, such as int, uint, and Number, that are defined by the Flash Player.
package.shortDescription: The flame.numerics package contains numeric types that complement the native numeric primitives, such as int, uint, and Number.

package.name: flame.serialization
package.description: The flame.serialization package contains classes that can be used for serializing and deserializing objects.
package.shortDescription: The flame.serialization package contains classes that can be used for serializing and deserializing objects.

package.name: flame.utils
package.description: The flame.utils package contains the utility classes.
package.shortDescription: The flame.utils package contains the utility classes.

package.name: flame.validators
package.description: The flame.validators package contains classes to support data validation.
package.shortDescription: The flame.validators package contains classes to support data validation.
